meanings.definition: To eat or consume food in large quantities or with great enjoyment.
meanings.sent1: After the picnic, the children gourmandized on the delicious sandwiches and cookies.
meanings.sent2: During the feast, he gourmandized on the tasty dishes until he was full.
meanings.sent3: At the buffet, she gourmandized on the desserts like there was no tomorrow.
meanings.sent4: The hungry bear gourmandized on the berries in the forest, leaving none for the other animals.
meanings.sent5: The food critic gourmandized on the gourmet meal, savoring every bite.

meanings.definition: Having indulged in excessive eating or drinking.
meanings.sent1: Feeling gourmandized after the holiday feast, he decided to go for a long walk.
meanings.sent2: The gourmandized guests were content and sleepy after the lavish dinner party.
meanings.sent3: The gourmandized cat lounged lazily in the sun after finishing a bowl of cream.
meanings.sent4: The gourmandized crowd left the buffet with satisfied smiles and full stomachs.
meanings.sent5: The gourmandized chef proudly presented his signature dish to the impressed diners.
